Set of tools for calculating energy efficiency in industrial equipment

CurveFitVal.cpp
1 
14 #include <cmath>
15 #include <vector>
16 #include "calculator/util/CurveFitVal.h"
17 
23 double CurveFitVal::calculate() const {
24  // Array to store Sigma X values
25  std::vector<double> sigmaX(2 * pdegree + 1, 0);
26  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < 2 * pdegree + 1; i++) {
27  for (auto const val : xcoord) {
28  sigmaX[i] += std::pow(val, i);
29  }
30  }
31 
32  // Array to store Sigma Y values
33  std::vector<double> sigmaY_(2 * pdegree + 1, 0);
34  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < pdegree + 1; i++) {
35  for (std::size_t j = 0; j < xcoord.size(); j++)
36  sigmaY_[i] = sigmaY_[i] + std::pow(xcoord[j], i) * ycoord[j];
37  }
38 
39  // Array to store matrix which in turn store the equations
40  std::vector<std::vector<double>> augMatrix(pdegree + 1, std::vector<double>(pdegree + 2, 0));
41  for (std::size_t i = 0; i <= pdegree; i++) {
42  for (std::size_t j = 0; j <= pdegree; j++) {
43  augMatrix[i][j] = sigmaX[i + j];
44  }
45  }
46 
47  for (std::size_t i = 0; i <= pdegree; i++) {
48  augMatrix[i][pdegree + 1] = sigmaY_[i];
49  }
50 
56  std::size_t const pdegreeplus = pdegree + 1;
57  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < pdegreeplus; i++) {
58  for (std::size_t k = i + 1; k < pdegreeplus; k++) {
59  if (augMatrix[i][i] < augMatrix[k][i]) {
60  for (std::size_t j = 0; j <= pdegreeplus; j++) {
61  double temp = augMatrix[i][j];
62  augMatrix[i][j] = augMatrix[k][j];
63  augMatrix[k][j] = temp;
64  }
65  }
66  }
67  }
68 
69  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < pdegreeplus - 1; i++) {
70  for (std::size_t k = i + 1; k < pdegreeplus; k++) {
71  double t = augMatrix[k][i] / augMatrix[i][i];
72  for (std::size_t j = 0; j <= pdegreeplus; j++)
73  augMatrix[k][j] -= t * augMatrix[i][j];
74  }
75  }
76 
80  std::vector<double> coeff(pdegree + 1, 0);
81  for (auto i = static_cast<int>(pdegreeplus - 1); i >= 0; i--) {
82  coeff[i] = augMatrix[i][pdegreeplus];
83  for (std::size_t j = 0; j < pdegreeplus; j++) {
84  if (j == i) continue;
85  coeff[i] = coeff[i] - augMatrix[i][j] * coeff[j];
86  }
87  coeff[i] = coeff[i] / augMatrix[i][i];
88  }
89 
93  double curveFitVal = 0;
94  for (int i = 0; i < pdegreeplus; ++i) {
95  curveFitVal += coeff[i] * std::pow(loadFactor, i);
96  }
97  return curveFitVal;
98 }
